Title: Great joy after the three great main forces meet
Notes: In October 1936, the First, Second and Fourth Front Armies join at Huining (Gansu Province. Presently called Jiangtaibao and located in Ningxia Hui Province). Photographs of the First, Second and Fourth Front Armies. The telegram announcing the link-up. Oil painting by Cai Liang and Zhang Ziyi, entitled "The joining of the three great main forces".
